title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 April 2009 - XWiki

alexmaru - (21/04/2009 09:17): hi sdumitriu  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 09:17): I'm writing a mail to my bosses from Pentalog  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 09:17): that I'm leaving the company :)  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 09:19): from 5th of May I'll be 100% into GSOC  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 09:47  
tmortagne joined #xwiki at 09:53

KermitTheFragger joined #xwiki at 10:06  
glerouge joined #xwiki at 10:19  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:19): hi glerouge  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:19): :)  
glerouge - (21/04/2009 10:20): Hi alexmaru  
arunreddy - (21/04/2009 10:20): Hello Everyone. !  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:20): hi arun  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:20): so this summer we will collaborate? :)  
glerouge - (21/04/2009 10:20): it seems so :)  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:21): just wanted you to know that I'm gonna start working on my project from 5th May  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:22): so maybe we'll make a plan of action in those days  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 10:22  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:22): until then I'm working full time for a company so I'll take a look only at some easy issues   
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:23): sdumitriu gave me a link  
arunreddy - (21/04/2009 10:23): what abt the instructions mail..  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:23): oh, I forgot about that  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 10:24): let's wait the mail first :P  
arunreddy - (21/04/2009 10:24): Hmmm  
glerouge - (21/04/2009 10:26): ok

JiBz - (21/04/2009 11:42): Hi every one !  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:42): hi ;)  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:43): omg, mibbit.com is very cool... it's an ajax IRC client and it shows me when someone on the channel is typing  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:43): wow  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:43): cool :P  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:43): at home I'm using chatzilla  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:43): firefox extension  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 11:44): ^^  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 11:44): I'am using mibbit  
Enygma` joined #xwiki at 11:45  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:45): you will see me with red... in the user list  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:45): because I'm typing  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:45): pretty cool :P  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 11:45): yes  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 11:45): ^^  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:45): :P  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 11:46): The future is Browser-embeded apps !  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 11:46): \*are  
alexmaru - (21/04/2009 11:46): :)  
cypromis joined #xwiki at 12:04  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 12:06  
mflorea left at 12:30 ("Leaving")  
KermitTheFragger - (21/04/2009 12:33): hi all, stupid question perhaps; But is there a survey application for Xwiki ? Or is this http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Survey achieved by some sort of hack (Iframe)?  
KermitTheFragger - (21/04/2009 12:34): this indicates its currently being worked on: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/SurveyApplication  
KermitTheFragger - (21/04/2009 12:34): getting mixed messages here :-)  
vmassol - (21/04/2009 12:38): KermitTheFragger: there's one existing implementation and we have a GSOC project to improve it even further  
KermitTheFragger - (21/04/2009 12:39): vmassol: I must be blind here; could you point me to the existing implementation ?  
vmassol - (21/04/2009 12:40): KermitTheFragger: http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Applications/PollsApplication  
vmassol - (21/04/2009 12:40): the link you pointed to is an integration with some external survey webapp   
KermitTheFragger - (21/04/2009 12:40): vmassol: ok, thanks a lot!

arunreddy - (21/04/2009 14:18): sdumtriu : Hi  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 14:23): Hi arunreddy  
arunreddy - (21/04/2009 14:23): can i continue working on jira issues. or any other plans.?  
arunreddy - (21/04/2009 14:24): instructions.. !  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 14:24): Yes, Jira issues for the moment  
arunreddy - (21/04/2009 14:25): ok  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 14:49): Someone knows how to change the panel layout  with velocity in a page (for exemple add or remove a right menu) ?  
kaaloo left at 14:53 (No route to host)  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 14:57): JiBz: What do you mean?  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 14:58): How to do something like that: #set($showRightPanels = true)  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 14:58): You just put that in the page content  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 14:59): Indeed for a page I want a custom menu at the right, but only for this page...  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 14:59): Ok I'm trying it  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 15:09): It almost work !  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 15:10): The line must be: #set($showRightPanels = "1")  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 15:10): but now I have to change the layout itself to have a good presentation  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 15:32): We have $xwiki.getUserPreference("name") but what about $xwiki.setUserPreference("name", "value'') ???  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 15:33): I don't understand where and how preference are saved ... :-(  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 15:34): There's no set  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 15:34): You have to edit the user document  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 15:35): ok thanks  
JiBz left at 15:51 ("http://www.mibbit.com ajax IRC Client")  
JiBz joined #xwiki at 15:52  
kaaloo joined #xwiki at 15:54  
JiBz left at 15:58 ("http://www.mibbit.com ajax IRC Client")

tharindu joined #xwiki at 16:35  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 16:58): With XWiki syntaxe 1.0 the following line doesn't manage to render a correct URL : \* [XXX>XXX.WebHome?menuSection=1]  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 16:58): I get an URL like : http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/XXX/?menuSection=1  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 16:59): Someone knows how to fix it .???  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 16:59): I would like to have : http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/XXX?menuSection=1  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 16:59): Without the "/" after XXX  
JiBz left at 17:03 ("http://www.mibbit.com ajax IRC Client")  
JiBz joined #xwiki at 17:03  
lucien joined #xwiki at 17:03  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:04): JiBz: That is not possible  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:04): Without '/', that's a different document  
lucien - (21/04/2009 17:04): Hi all,  
lucien - (21/04/2009 17:04): someone knows how to merge two war with maven ?  
JiBz left at 17:04 (Client Quit)  
JiBz joined #xwiki at 17:05  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 17:05): Sorry net problem Im back  
alexmaru left at 17:06 ("http://www.mibbit.com ajax IRC Client")  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:06): (05:04:04 PM) sdumitriu: JiBz: That is not possible  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:06): (05:04:26 PM) sdumitriu: Without '/', that's a different document  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:07): You can have [XXX>Main.XXX?menuSection=1] if you want  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 17:08): ok  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 17:09): Thanks again  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:09): And you can get rid of /Main/ in the URL by editing xwiki.cfg and uncommenting the setting:  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:09): xwiki.usedefaultweb=0  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:09): And set it to 1  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:10): xwiki.usedefaultweb=1  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 17:10): I try it now  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 17:10): My goal is to get working with: #if ($request.getParameter("menuSection").equals("1")) in a .vm file  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 17:10): But that works anyway  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 17:17): It work just the way I want !  
JiBz - (21/04/2009 17:18): You are very helpful !

jvelociter - (21/04/2009 17:53): sdumitriu: I'm going to start working on replacing our LB, just to check, you haven't started anything on thiss ?

jvelociter - (21/04/2009 18:05): it's not used anywhere in XE, right ?  
jvelociter - (21/04/2009 18:05): just in WWK  
asyd - (21/04/2009 18:05): p/S 13  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 18:06): Let me check, the users or group editor has some refresh action  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 18:08): usersandgroups.js makeAddHandler: window.lb = new Lightbox(url, saveurl, redirecturl);  
sdumitriu - (21/04/2009 18:08): Is this the redirect you are talking about?  
jvelociter - (21/04/2009 18:13): yes  
jvelociter - (21/04/2009 18:14): ok  
jvelociter - (21/04/2009 18:14): I'll handle it then
